title: #39 Press The Right Button w/ Dr. Emily Morse
itunes:title: #39 Press The Right Button w/ Dr. Emily Morse
description:
Between You and Nikki today's pod covers some great topics about sexuality. She and Andrew dig deep into his love for, of all people, Hugh Grant. In the news they cover a sex toy study, misophonia and ultimatums. They connect with the expert on sex and host of Sex w/ Emily, Dr. Emily Morse in the Deep Dive segment to learn more about masturbation, solo or with a partner. In the Final Thought, Nikki and Andrew share something that they've been wondering about relationships.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
